snippet: Complaints of dangerous disciplinary practices involving Tasers are cropping up all over the country.
abstract: Editorial condemns rising use of dangerous disciplinary practices using shock weapons in schools around United States; notes the Taser, most popular of such weapons, can cause serious injury or even death; holds police officers wielding weapons are often ill-prepared to deal with children; calls for elected officials to ban shock weapons from schools.
lead_paragraph: Complaints of dangerous disciplinary practices involving Tasers are cropping up all over the country.
